email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, but that’s the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton and the demurrage rate of $25,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and send over the fixture recap. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for confirming. Attached is the fixture recap for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. Laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October, freight rate at $51.25 per metric ton, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Please review and let me know if any changes are needed. Best, Sarah
